files.name: main.py
files.content:
number= int ( input ( "Enter a number (0 to exit) :"))

while ( number != 0 ): 
    counter = int ( number )
    factorial = int ( number ) 

    while (counter > 1):
        print( factorial, 'x', counter-1 )
        factorial = int ( factorial * (counter - 1) )
        counter = int ( counter - 1 )
        
    if ( counter > 0 ):     
        print(number,"factorial is",factorial)
        
    if ( counter < 0 ): 
        print ( "Error: Must be greater than 0")
    
    number= int ( input ( "Enter a number (0 to exit) :"))
    

print("Done.")
